name: OneShot: Sniper Assassin
description:
Sniper Assassin OneShot - it's a first-person real sniper shooter game. You have to kill the leaders of the Chinese triads, do not let steal russian secret information, kill mafia boses and fbi traitors. Kira is your lovely assistant will help you with job. The game is full of modern sniper weapons, the world of criminals and traitors - all in OneShot game: Sniper Assassin.

"I'm a secret agent of special department of the Secret Service. In open and private sources no information about me or my work. I do not exist. But I have enough work always.

If justice can not punish the offender, it takes me. If you want to protect or eliminate purpose outside the jurisdiction of our Government, I again take up my cause.

I have no room for mistake. No one will take responsibility for my failure, as I simply do not exist. So I do not ever admit mistakes. I'm just getting a job and doing it right."

Features:
- Free sniper simulator game
- The parabolic trajectory of the bullet, wind speed and direction
- Modern 3D graphics and character animation
- Large selection of deadly weapons
- Easy and intuitive interface
- Action Camera with well-aimed shots and headshot
- More awards for special assignments in each mission
- In some mission may appear an enemy sniper, so be prepared
- You have to perform the job in different conditions: heavy rain, night, sunrise, dirty lens sniper scope
- Real sniper simulator - reloading, breathing, wind and bullet physics

Each weapon in the game is unique and has its own set of special features:
- Breath - Sniper holds his breath and firmly holding the weapon, the sight is now easier;
- Slowing down time - shot in the head fleeing the leader of the Russian mafia is not a problem;
- Explosive cartridges - large radius of destruction, the perfect weapon for eliminating multiple purposes;
- Destructive power - the enemy will be defeated with a single shot from any weapon;
- Jamming of the radio - the enemies will not be able to raise the alarm, you have more time to eliminate the guard;
- Amendment to the wind - to shoot accurately at a target, the sniper himself will take into account the wind and do not miss;
- And much more;

"The sniper scope world looks completely different."

A warning:
The game OneShot: Sniper Assassin contains adult material: demonstrated murder up close, showing blood. You might want to close the access to it for your children.
